definitions.text: an artifact that has been brought into existence by someone
the event that occurred at the beginning of something
examples: from its creation the plan was doomed to failure

definitions.text: the act of starting something for the first time; introducing something new
examples: she looked forward to her initiation as an adult
the foundation of a new scientific society

definitions.text: (theology) God's act of bringing the universe into existence

examples: they study the evolution of the universe
